data.name: Antistatus
data.description: You are immune to a single status

data.name: Resistance
data.description: You have Resistance to a single type of damage (except physical)

data.name: Bulwark
data.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Defense.

data.name: Dual Resistance
data.description: You have Resistance to two types of damage (except physical)

data.name: Swordbreaker
data.description: You have Resistance to physical damage

data.name: Immunity
data.description: You are immune to a single type of damage (except physical)

data.name: Omnishield
data.description: Get +1 bonus to Defense and to Magic Defense

data.name: Perfect Health
data.description: You are immune to all status effects

data.name: Damage Change
data.description: All damage dealt by your weapons, spells, and Skills becomes of a specific type.

data.name: Accuracy Up
data.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Accuracy Checks.

data.name: Magic Up
data.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Magic Checks.

data.name: Vitality Up
data.description: When you recover HP, you recover 5 extra HP.

data.name: Healing Up
data.description: Spells you cast that whose effects restore Hit Points will restore 5 extra Hit Points.

data.name: Spell Up
data.description: Spells you cast deal 5 extra damage.

data.name: Weapon Up
data.description: Your attacks with (choose one: melee, ranged) weapons deal 5 extra damage.
